website_summaries.verdict: The comfortable Urbanears Plattan ADV on-ear headphones delivers laudable audio performance for the price.
pros: Clean, crisp, balanced audio performance with rich bass response
Detachable cable and removable, cleanable headband

customer_reviews.title: They're okay.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really all right. The buttons don't work very well so I have just given up trying to play/stop or adjust volume because it's incredibly laggy or just doesn't do what it's supposed to do. This is my first pair of bluetooth headphones and I don't know if maybe you have to pay over 100 to get really good ones? The bass doesn't come through very clearly, nothing is very clear to be honest. I don't know if I'm keeping them. 75 is a lot for me to be like 'meh' ya know? That great review from the top contributor is what made me buy and honestly I don't know why he's so jazzed.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good and they appear to be be well made
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and they appear to be be well made, but they are not that comfortable. They are very tight and I am a female with a relatively small head.
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  good sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair 3ish years ago, and they finally broke ...so i invested in a 2nd pair. Love these fpr running on the treadmill. Good sound quality, comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: StarBrite

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of BT headphones and I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Perfect size (although I could see fit being a problem if I had a large head), minimal branding, great sound. I have owned Urbanears before but the build quality and durability are fantastic. The price is right, the charge lasts about 6 workouts, they sound good and I love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, sound is good
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, sound is good.. only problem is that after a while my ears hurt. I’m 5’3”, F, 120lbs.. my head is pretty small. Thirty minutes waiting at the airport during layover. Nope. Ears are in pain. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: AJS4881

customer_reviews.title: Clips Snapped, No repair options.
customer_reviews.text: These were one of my favorite headphones. The plastic hinges broke after a couple of years. Knowing of the design flaw, i contacted urbanears to see if they offered a repair kit. Nope, there was nothing they could do. They do not offer any repair services. I would buy again, but not at the current price, knowing they will break the same way.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: I want a new headset
customer_reviews.text: I changed phone and I cannot deprogram the headset and they will not send me another one so as far as I am concerned they are garbage because I cannot use them what are they going to do about it this happened a year ago they've been sitting in my closet ever since I want a new headset that I can program to my new phone
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great functionality for the price. The right headphone has touch controls and they connect very well to new devices. The outer pieces are plastic, but they do not look cheap or breakable.
customer_reviews.author: Taren

customer_reviews.title: My daughter (who is 12) LOVE LOVE LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (who is 12) LOVE LOVE LOVES these. As an adult, I thought they were too snug. They seem like they are made for children, even though these are just their standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and faulty
customer_reviews.text: Lost the ear foam after two weeks, but even before that, there were lag/connectivity issues. Also the mic without the wire wasn't loud enough. the sound is really great
customer_reviews.author: Jade Simpson

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: not noise cancelling. great sound. comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: shelley m hicklin

customer_reviews.title: I've had these headphones before but in white and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones before but in white and I never had any problems the first time until I dropped my longboard on them. I bought these ones to replace the white ones and they worked perfectly for a while but now they don't bluetooth to my phone anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Doesn't hurt my ear and theres no need to even touch my phone while I'm using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kis

customer_reviews.title: Great design, soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great design, soft and comfortable, love the color. It's easy to adjust and connect to any device. The battery life is pretty good and it charges up fast too. The swipe interface is handy and not too sensitive. I really like the products Urbanears offers. This is my third item from them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the hard to buy for teen
customer_reviews.text: I hit this one out of the park!! Buying for my teenage grandson is always a challenge he was so excited to get these! I think he thought Grammy was pretty cool. The only negative was I thought they were a little small. Make them larger and they’ll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Got these about five months ago, and still working perfectly. Good sound, great battery life, intuitive touch controls, and very portable. Urbanears continues to be my favorite brand of headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Jorden

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this pair of wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this pair of wireless headphones. While they certainly look the part, they are definitely not comfortable. I would get headaches from wearing them for as little as 10 minutes. The ear cushions were too small and put a lot of pressure on my ears. I wish they had an option of larger ear cushions. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: NPR

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. This is one of my colors and it even has a back-up headphone jack cord when needed
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bad muffs, they hurt after not too long, otherwise pretty good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones; I own two pairs now, both are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jnmandal

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought the insurance
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for two months and they won’t charge and Bluetooth does not work now. Glad I bought the insurance...
customer_reviews.author: Abagayle

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and have good sound quality. Mic is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nauroz

customer_reviews.title: These are great, the battery lasts forever - I've had them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, the battery lasts forever - I've had them for three months and have charged them twice. A little tight at first but you can stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are pretty decent. It took some time to figure out how to pair them but after doing so, they seem to be working pretty well. The color is really pretty too
customer_reviews.author: Lifeisgreat

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, I’ve had them over a year now and can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: PSYCHOBOB77

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones for the money. Sound better than Beats which costs way more. I recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: mark trudel

customer_reviews.title: sounds great.....broke easy.
customer_reviews.text: swivel hinge-pin broke. No replacement parts available. Mostly my fault, however, the pins were plastic instead of metal.
customer_reviews.author: earphtone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far I love them!! perfect sound and nice color
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it ... it was my husband gift and he love it
customer_reviews.author: Mardaly Batista

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great delivery and product was exactly as listed, with a great price. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Works fine some of the time. But most of the time the Bluetooth connection doesn't seem to work properly and the audio stutters, forcing me to plug them in. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Schwabe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product the sound is excellent. For the money and quality is a very good option.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro German Santamaria

customer_reviews.title: These sound great, as good as my Bose Quiet Comforts
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, as good as my Bose Quiet Comforts, at least. The swipe controls are a little funky, they are neat, but I get missed punches with it pretty often. The Bluetooth sometimes doesn't want to connect, a off/on cycle usually fixes it. Overall, a good value.
customer_reviews.author: james west

customer_reviews.title: It sucks because I love the style and simplicity of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand. It's been less than a month, and already the headphones are not working. I tried to charge it one morning, and it just wouldn't charge. The only reason I am giving this two stars is because it still has a slot for a headphone jack, and I can still use it wired. However, this completely defeats the purpose and I cannot return the item since it is a week past the return date. It sucks because I love the style and simplicity of the product, but it just isn't worth purchasing if it will break so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good connection and comfortable but the sound is very low
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Urbanears Plattan ADV Wireless On-Ear Bluetooth Headphones, Black (4091098)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackMove around freely, pick up calls and listen to music on the go without tangled cords. Hassle-free as it should be! The Plattan ADV Wireless headphone is the first Bluetooth headphone in the Urbanears line up. It comes with a built in microphone, a touch interface on the ear cap and it is ready for up to 14 hours solid playtime before recharging. Add lots of cool and innovative features like the machine washable headband, collapsible structure and a ZoundPlug and you have yourself a match made in headphone heaven.
The Plattan ADV Wireless headphone is the first Bluetooth headphone in the Urbanears line-up. It comes with a built in microphone, a swipe interface on the ear cup and it is ready for up to 14-hours solid playtime before recharging.
feature_bullets: Pair up with Bluetooth and enjoy up to 14-hours of playtime on a single charge
Ear cup swipe interface lets you cycle through your playlist and pick up calls
3D hinge for an extra ergonomic fit and collapsible structure for easy portability
Includes a washable headband; easy to remove and toss in the wash
Built-in mic/remote to enjoy wireless calls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars462 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
